Each unit on the map represents 5 units, let x be the number of units. The group wants to travel from its current location on the map to the South Pole, and then back to base camp, passing throught it current location.

 

First, the group travels three units up. (3x)

Next, since the group wants to travel back to their previous location in order to get back to base camp, they have to travel three miles down again. (3x+3x)

Last they have to travel 13 units horizontally to the right to get back to base camp. (3x+3x+12x)
